verses.verse: <WG5124> But This <WG1161> Know Thou, <WG1097> That <WG3754> In The <WG1722> Last <WG2078> Days <WG2250> Will Be Present <WG1764> Times <WG2540> Difficult; <WG5467>

<WG2071> For Will Be <WG1063> <WG3588> Men <WG444> Lovers Of Self, <WG5367> Lovers Of Money, <WG5366> Vaunting, <WG213> Proud, <WG5244> Evil Speakers. <WG989> To Parents <WG1118> Disobedient, <WG545> Unthankful, <WG884> Unholy, <WG462>
Without Natural Affection, <WG794> Implacable, <WG786> Slanderers, <WG1228> Incontinent, <WG193> Savage, <WG434> Not Lovers Of Good, <WG865>
Betrayers, <WG4273> Headlong, <WG4312> Puffed Up, <WG5187> Lovers Of Pleasure <WG5369> Rather <WG3123> Than <WG2228> Lovers Of God; <WG5377>
Having <WG2192> A Form <WG3446> Of Piety, <WG2150> <WG3588> But The <WG1161> Power <WG1411> Of It <WG846> Denying : <WG720> And <WG2532> These <WG5128> Turn Away From. <WG665>

<WG1537> <WG5130> For Of These <WG1063> Are <WG1526> Those Who <WG3588> Are Entering <WG1744> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> Houses <WG3614> And <WG2532> Leading Captive <WG162> <WG3588> Silly Women <WG1133> Laden <WG4987> With Sins, <WG266> Led Away <WG71> By Lusts <WG1939> Various, <WG4164>
Always <WG3842> Learning <WG3129> And <WG2532> Never <WG3368> To The <WG1519> Knowledge <WG1922> Of The Truth <WG225> To Come <WG2064> Able. <WG1410>

<WG3739> <WG5158> Now In The Way <WG1161> Jannes <WG2389> And <WG2532> Jambres <WG2387> Withstood <WG436> Moses, <WG3475> Thus <WG3779> Also <WG2532> These <WG3778> Withstand <WG436> The <WG3588> Truth, <WG225> Men <WG444> Utterly Corrupted <WG2704> <WG3588> In Mind, <WG3563> Found Worthless <WG96> As Regards <WG4012> The <WG3588> Faith. <WG4102>

' But <WG235> <WG3756> They Shall Not Advance <WG4298> <WG1909> Farther, <WG4119> <WG3588> For <WG1063> Folly <WG454> Their <WG846> Fully Manifest <WG1552> Shall Be <WG2071> To All, <WG3956> As <WG5613> Also <WG2532> That <WG3588> Of Those <WG1565> Became. <WG1096>

<WG4771> But Thou <WG1161> Hast Closely Followed <WG3877> My <WG3450> <WG3588> Teaching, <WG1319> <WG3588> Conduct, <WG72> <WG3588> Purpose, <WG4286> <WG3588> Faith, <WG4102> <WG3588> Patience, <WG3115> <WG3588> Love, <WG26> <WG3588> Endurance, <WG5281>

<WG3588> Persecutions, <WG1375> <WG3588> Sufferings : <WG3804> Such <WG3634> As To Me <WG3427> Happened <WG1096> In <WG1722> Antioch, <WG490> In <WG1722> Iconium, <WG2430> In <WG1722> Lystra; <WG3082> What Manner Of <WG3634> Persecutions <WG1375> I Endured; <WG5297> And <WG2532> Out Of <WG1537> All <WG3956> Me <WG3165> Delivered <WG4506> The <WG3588> Lord. <WG2962>
And <WG2532> All <WG3956> Indeed <WG1161> Who <WG3588> Wish <WG2309> Piously <WG2153> To Live <WG2198> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> Will Be Persecuted. <WG1377>
<WG4190> But Wicked <WG1161> Men <WG444> And <WG2532> Imposters <WG1114> Shall Advance <WG4298> To <WG1909> <WG3588> Worse, <WG5501> Misleading <WG4105> And <WG2532> Being Mislead. <WG4105>

<WG4771> But Thou <WG1161> Abide <WG3306> In <WG1722> The Things <WG3739> Thou Didst Learn, <WG3129> And <WG2532> Wast Assured Of, <WG4104> Having Known <WG1492> From <WG3844> Whom <WG5101> Thou Didst Learn Them; <WG3129>

And <WG2532> That <WG3754> From <WG575> A Babe <WG1025> The <WG3588> Sacred <WG2413> Letters <WG1121> Thou Hast Known, <WG1492> Which Are <WG3588> Able <WG1410> Thee <WG4571> To Make Wise <WG4679> To <WG1519> Salvation, <WG4991> Through <WG1223> Faith <WG4102> Which Is <WG3588> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

Every <WG3956> Scripture Is <WG1124> God Inspired <WG2315> And <WG2532> Profitable <WG5624> For <WG4314> Teaching, <WG1319> For <WG4314> , Conviction, <WG1650> For <WG4314> Correction, <WG1882> For <WG4314> Discipline <WG3809> Which Is <WG3588> In <WG1722> Righteousness; <WG1343>
That <WG2443> Complete <WG739> May Be <WG5600> The <WG3588> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> Man, <WG444> To <WG4314> Every <WG3956> Work <WG2041> Good <WG18> Fully Fitted. <WG1822>
